explains: n. 乡下人，农村人；同胞

sentences.en: He had the red face of a countryman.
sentences.cn: 他有着乡下人的红润脸庞。

sentences.en: He beat his fellow countryman, Andre Agassi, 6-4, 6-3, 6-2.
sentences.cn: 他以6-4, 6-3, 6-2战胜了他的同胞安德烈·阿加西。

sentences.en: Sampras looks set to play his fellow countryman Agassi in the final.
sentences.cn: 桑普拉斯好像注定要在决赛中遇上他的同胞阿加西。
